title: ISic030115. Part of a caduceus of the city of Hi(p)pana
body:
Facsimile Images

1ΔΑΜΟΣΙΟΝ
2ΙΠΑ[.....]

Apparatus criticus

  • Text after previous editions

English translation

State property of the people of Hipana

commentary

Coins bearing the same ethnic, with the same spelling support the restoration (so Manganaro). The site of Hip(p)ana (also Sippana) is now generally accepted to be that on Montagna dei Cavalli, just to the south of modern Prizzi.

bibliography

  • Ampolo 2006 185 appendix B no.3 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10002458
  • 93 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000160
